description: This file defines the PlaylistProvider class, which manages playlists and interacts with AudioController to play songs in a Flutter music streaming app.

classes.name: PlaylistProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages playlists, interacts with a song library, and communicates with an AudioController for playback.

methods.name: seedWithSampleData
methods.description: Initializes the library with sample songs and adds a 'Daily Vibes' playlist containing these songs.

methods.name: createPlaylist
methods.description: Creates a new empty playlist with the given name, if it doesn't already exist.

methods.name: addToPlaylist
methods.description: Adds a song to a specified playlist, avoiding duplicates.

methods.name: removeFromPlaylist
methods.description: Removes a song from a specified playlist.

methods.name: playSongs
methods.description: Uses the AudioController to set the playback queue to a list of songs, optionally starting at a specific index and auto-playing.
